attributes.action: Abolish Positive Discrimination in the work place
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Harriet Harman's appauling proposals on positive discrimination should be abandoned NOW. There is nothing positive about it! Discrimination is discrimination. If this racist sexist piece of nonsence becomes law then you and your cabinet Prime Minister should be ashamed. It also surely goes against the European Convention on Human Rights.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
